verbose_text: Taken together, these data provide strong evidence blocking the 4-1BB pathway attenuated crystalline silica induced pulmonary inflammation and subsequent fibrosis : i) inflammation stage : The acute Th1 and Th17 response was alleviated, accompanied by down regulated expression of IFN-gamma IL-17A inflammatory mediators.
evidence: 4-1BB pathway attenuated crystalline silica-induced pulmonary inflammation
